body: It's better to implement `Function::flags` in terms of begin and end iterators (this can support both `initializer_list`s and `variable_list`s), and add the overloads that dispatch to it in `function.h` so they can be inlined.
body_html: It's better to implement Function::flags in terms of begin and end iterators (this can support both initializer_lists and variable_lists), and add the overloads that dispatch to it in function.h so they can be inlined.
body_text: It's better to implement Function::flags in terms of begin and end iterators (this can support both initializer_lists and variable_lists), and add the overloads that dispatch to it in function.h so they can be inlined.
